name: PlantMatter
desc: Various parts of plants and flora, usable as fuel.

name: Dirt
desc: Collected from terraforming with your Pickaxe or M.O.L.E.  Use unknown.

name: Limestone
desc: Collected from terraforming, or from minable deposits.  Eventually used in crafting.

name: Iron Ore
desc: Extraordinarily pure source of Iron.  Convertible into $7 at a Smelter.

name: Copper Ore
desc: Extraordinarily pure source of Copper.  Convertible into $8 at a Smelter.

name: PlantMatter Fiber
desc: Sturdy and lightweight plant material.  Can be used as fuel.

name: BioBrick
desc: Compressed biomatter.  Shaped for simplified storage and transport.  Excellent fuel source.

name: Iron Ingot
desc: Ingot of Iron.  Heavy and durable.

name: Copper Ingot
desc: Ingot of Copper.  Light and conductive.

name: PlantMatter Frame
desc: Lightweight structural material made from condensed $5.

name: Iron Frame
desc: Rugged and sturdy Iron frame.  Structurally sound.

name: Iron Components
desc: Gears, bolts, rivets and beyond.  Forged with Iron.

name: Copper Frame
desc: Lightweight Copper frame.  Highly conductive.

name: Copper Components
desc: Lightweight Copper frame.  Highly conductive.

name: Copper Wire
desc: Light, durable and conductive Copper wire.

name: Mechanical Components
desc: Clockwork mechanisms, joints, connections and more.  Packed together and ready for use.

name: Electric Components
desc: Electrical chips, sensors, motors and more.  Bundled together and ready for use.

name: Processor Unit
desc: Powerful processing unit.

name: Power Floor
desc: Composed of ultraconductive materials.  Requires electrification to be used as a power source for machinery.

name: Stairs
desc: Composed of unusual plastics.  Cannot conduct electricity between $18s.

name: Beacon
desc: Emits trackable signal visible on the compass.

name: Pickaxe
desc: Serviceable pickaxe.  Capable of breaking and harvesting ore from basic mineral veins.

name: Mining Drill
desc: Magnetized tip simultaneously excavates and collects.  Must be built at Ore Veins.

name: Smelter
desc: Smelts ores into ingots.

name: Assembler
desc: Automatically assembles parts and machines.  Requires selection of recipe.

name: Planter
desc: Facility for cultivation of alien flora.  Experimental photonics enable rapid growth.

name: Thresher
desc: Separates alien flora into materials for fuel and production.

name: Water Wheel
desc: Uses water flow as means to generate kinetic energy that can be converted into electric power.  Used with Crank Generator.

name: Crank Generator
desc: Converts kinetic energy into usable power through hand crank or connected external sources of energy.

name: Red Memory Core
desc: Processing unit that enables activation of standard technologies.  Core Cluster is formed at 10 Cores.

name: Green Mem. Core
desc: Memory Core variant but it's GREEN.
